channel.description: Decide: SCIM vs Okta Workflows or both? Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: Possible duplicate of ID: 770 (Compare high-code and no-code lifecycle management apps) Why is this here?: Requested by product management (Jeff Taylor). Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.
